item.title: Ad Lucem
item.description:
Ad Lucem

Ad Lucem is a LARP campaign set in the year 1900, in Victorian England, and in a world that is eerily similar to our own. It is in the middle of an occult revival, it is on the brink of change and there is an energy born from the freshly dawned, new century in the air.Our players are characters that, in a small way, have seen through the illusion that gives “normal” people a sense of security and warmth. With this realization comes power, and the knowledge that the greater
